name: BHUMR-C
short_description: BHUMR-C is a minimalist Ubuntu/Mint hybrid built from the ground up using the Ubuntu mini/net install iso with the Cinnamon 2.4 DE from the nightly repos. It gets updates from both the Ubuntu Trusty LTS repository and the Mint 17 Qiana mainline repo. Also includes different default artwork and custom themes from Gnome-Look.org. Also included in the project are 64 and 32 bit versions of Brian's Mint MATE Remix, a re-spin of Linux Mint 17, with the addition of the same custom themes found in BHUMR-C, with some other packages found in Mint removed, to give the user a "blank slate" to add the packages they like.
